backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing user profiles, access control, course management, subject/topic storage, and study material handling with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for build and deployment fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted list of frontend file summaries describing component purpose, hooks, utilities, and configuration modules.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Documentation explaining the root cause of frontend build failures, the implemented fixes, and step-by-step build and deploy instructions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app root element and main entry script.
frontend/public/env.json: Environment config specifying backend canister ID and network mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing the full page structure with theme support and layout sections.
frontend/src/backend.did.ts: Candid interface factory defining all backend types and service methods for actor creation.
frontend/src/components/CoursesSection.t: Renders a tabbed course list with subject filters, icons, pricing, and loading states using data from course query hooks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays site footer with branding, course links, subject anchors, and social icons, including smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with logo, navigation menu, subject dropdown, and smooth scrolling to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Shows a hero banner with gradients, intro text, call‑to‑action buttons, and a decorative image.
frontend/src/components/SubjectCard.tsx: Represents a subject card with expandable topics, backend topic fetching, and study material link handling.
Renders a grid of predefined subjects as SubjectCards, each with metadata, icons, and backend-driven topics.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating courses, subjects, and topics using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme configuration with custom rose‑themed light/dark colors and styled scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats optional INR bigint values into displayable currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Fetches a query parameter from the current page’s URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and layout utilities using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, requirements, known issues, and feature tracking metadata.
